title: Being Pet Feels Good
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Hwaah~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>See, it doesn’t hurt anymore, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah! It’s so strange nya~. After being pet by Emma-san, the pain is gone and Rin feels better nya-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, get even better now~ *stroke stroke* ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nyaa~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You kind of remind me of Neve-chan back in Switzerland<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Neve-chan? Is that one of your friends, Emma-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah. She’s small, lively, and pure white, one of my beloved friends~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Rin wants to meet Emma-san’s friend nya~. If it’s liveliness, Rin won’t lose! Rin isn’t really white though<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, I guess so. Aaah, I miss Neve-chan now~! Rin-chan! Let me hug you~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
